div.em: Current conditions as of 20 Apr 17:55 pm CDT

td.span: Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low around 42. Southwest wind 6 to 13 mph becoming northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 21 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 59. Northwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.
Clear, with a low around 41. Northwest wind 5 to 9 mph becoming calm.
